name: Chaos Cube (yanix)
description:
Hello Jammers or people from itch :) 

This game was made during the “Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2”, using the GDevelop Game Engine. The theme here was "Let There Be Chaos!"

My Highscore was “149”, i would like to hear what highscore you got :)

Plays best in Fullscreen!

The sound might be delayed after you made your first shot, but thats just because you need to have interacted with the game before, so that the sound works :)

Description:

In this game you are playing as a Cube, defending yourself from other smaller Cubes that are trying to attack you. You have 3 Lives

Controls:

  • W = Move Left
  • S = Move Right
  • R = Reload (if you don't have any Ammo)
  • LMB = Shoot
  • K = Show FPS

Credits & Additional Information:

All art was made by myself using the Software “LibreSprite” except the Music.

I used a Color Palette from lospec.com (https://lospec.com/palette-list/island-joy-16)

Fonts: “Roboto-Regular” (https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Roboto), consolab (LibreSprite-Included Font)

Background music by Marcelo Fernández (http://www.marcelofernandezmusic.com).

Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).

The video: Retro Vibes - Retro Music [Royalty Free]

If there are bugs i would really appreciate it if you would post it in the comments :D

Thanks to everyone that helped me with some Errors i had in my game :)
